thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: Sport Intern - Sports Management

title: Sport Intern - Sports Management
text: Assist with the planning, coordination and implementation of state-level events...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
